author: sjsedmonds
title: Great Premier Inn - recommended
text: This Premier Inn is adjacent to Stratford International, Olympic Park and the huge Westfield shopping centre. The hotel is relatively new. The rooms are great, very clean, good size, all the things you expect from Premier Inn, breakfast great and on site restaurant but also lots of choice at Westfield. Highly recommended.
